name: RTCTransit
0:
”Alexa, open ride r. t. c.”
”Alexa, launch ride r. t. c.”
”Alexa, ask ride r. t. c. what is my stop number”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ride r. t. c.
des:
rideRTC provides real-time arrivals for the Regional Transportation Commission of Southern Nevada (RTC) public transit system. 

Just ask Alexa... “Ask ride RTC next arrivals 1234”. The number 1234 is the specific stop where you want to receive arrival times for. 

You can find RTC stop numbers here: http://www.rtcsnv.com/interactivemap
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
